sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_EventInstance.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ handlemark, eventbaseid, baseschema, eventtype, eventsubject, eventaction, eventcondition, handletype, operationname, duetime, eventstatus, logrecord /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_wf_eventinstance where 1=1 and operationtype = 'SLA' $customwhere$ order by eventcreatetime desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_EventAction.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ pid, eventid, ruleid, duetime, noticetime, noticedtimes, nextnoticetime, status, actionstatus /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_usla_eventaction where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by createtime desc

sqlquery.name: SQL_USLA_EventMessage.query
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ content, goal, 1, sendflag, infoinputtime, '', '' /*COUNT*/ from bs_t_sm_smsmonitor where 1=1 $customwhere$ order by sendflag, infoinputtime desc, goal
